full_text:
Used non-metric multidimensional scaling here to assess the (dis)similarity in #NFL team behavior based on 15 performance metrics (EPA, pressure rate, point diff etc.).

Can get a sense of the relationships in team "profiles" using multivariate data.

#nflverse #sportsanalytics https://t.co/fENJE4Ripl

The #nflverse games data will be updated tonight, after 8pm ET when the schedule is officially announced by the NFL on https://t.co/x0A940v0wN.

At that point @nflseedR will begin using that schedule when simulating 2022, which will also be the default.
